notes:
mirabilis puff stitch hat crochet pattern

looking for a cozy, textured hat pattern that’s quick, easy, and perfect for the whole family? the mirabilis puff stitch hat has you covered!

designed in worsted weight yarn, this hat features a simple textured repeat that creates a beautiful puff stitch design. worked flat side to side and then seamed, it’s straightforward to crochet and simple to adjust. the hat also includes a lovely deep, soft brim that you can fold up or leave slouchy — totally customizable to your style.

with seven sizes included (from baby through large adult), this pattern is ideal for making gifts, stocking up for craft fairs and markets, or keeping your own family warm all winter long.

this is a pdf crochet pattern for the mirabilis puff stitch hat. the hats are crocheted using us yo slst, sc and hdc stitches with simple crown shaping.

*please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english, not a finished product.
